methods.name: Entry
methods.description: Create an entry object to define new data to insert into a log.

examples.caption: You will also receive Entry objects when using logging#getEntries and logging/log#getEntries.

params.name: data
params.description:
• The data to use as the value for this log entry.

    If providing an object, these value types are supported:

    • String
    • Number
    • Boolean
    • Buffer
    • Object

    • Array

      Any other types are stringified with String(value).
